snippet.title: Echoes of Mystralia Reveal Trailer - Future Games Show Gamescom 2024
snippet.description:
A world premiere trailer revealed Echoes of Mystralia, the sequel to Borealys Games' Mages of Mystralia. It's an action roguelike with a modular spell crafting system, coming soon to PC.

https://www.youtube.com/@FutureGamesShow

#Echoesofmystralia #FutureGamesShow #FGS #futuregamesshow2024 #gamescom
